body.p: A financial asset shall be measured at fair value through other comprehensive income if both of the following conditions are met:

li.p: the financial asset is held within a business model whose objective is achieved by both collecting contractual cash flows and selling financial assets and
the contractual terms of the financial asset give rise on specified dates to cash flows that are solely payments of principal and interest on the principal amount outstanding.

body.p: Paragraphs B4.1.1–B4.1.26 provide guidance on how to apply these conditions.
